itemPage.title: Parisian Steak
itemPage.description: Juicy steak with a Paris-style herb sauce.
itemPage.ingredients: Beef, butter, garlic, thyme, salt, pepper
itemPage.preparation: Sear the meat on a hot pan, add butter and herbs. Serve hot.

itemPage.title: Japanese Meatballs
itemPage.description: Japanese-style meatballs with soy and ginger sauce.
itemPage.ingredients: Ground beef, eggs, breadcrumbs, ginger, soy sauce
itemPage.preparation: Mix ingredients, form meatballs, and fry. Add sauce on top.

itemPage.title: Grilled Beach Meat
itemPage.description: Grilled meat cuts with a Mediterranean twist.
itemPage.ingredients: Veal, lemon, herbs, olive oil
itemPage.preparation: Rub meat with olive oil and spices, grill on fire.

itemPage.title: Silent Forest Cake
itemPage.description: Dark chocolate cake with berries.
itemPage.ingredients: Dark chocolate, flour, eggs, sugar, strawberries
itemPage.preparation: Bake the cake, decorate with berries, and serve cold.

itemPage.title: Future World
itemPage.description: Colorful jelly dessert with exotic fruit flavors.
itemPage.ingredients: Gelatin, fruit juices, sugar, natural food coloring
itemPage.preparation: Melt, cool, and pour into fun molds.

itemPage.title: Mindful Dessert
itemPage.description: Vegan chocolate mousse with coconut cream.
itemPage.ingredients: Avocado, cocoa, maple syrup, coconut milk
itemPage.preparation: Blend everything and slightly freeze.

itemPage.title: Quinoa Salad
itemPage.description: Refreshing salad with vegetables, quinoa, and lemon.
itemPage.ingredients: Quinoa, cucumber, tomato, mint, lemon
itemPage.preparation: Cook quinoa, chop vegetables, mix with lemon and olive oil.

itemPage.title: Tomato & Basil Salad
itemPage.description: Classic Italian salad with mozzarella.
itemPage.ingredients: Tomatoes, basil, mozzarella, balsamic vinegar
itemPage.preparation: Slice, arrange nicely, season, and serve fresh.

itemPage.title: Hot Chocolate Salad
itemPage.description: Dessert fantasy with whipped cream and melted chocolate.
itemPage.ingredients: Hot chocolate, whipped cream, strawberries, cookies
itemPage.preparation: Heat chocolate, pour over strawberries and whipped cream.

itemPage.title: Weather Soup
itemPage.description: A light soup suitable for any weather.
itemPage.ingredients: Water, root vegetables, spices
itemPage.preparation: Cook everything together until vegetables are soft.

itemPage.title: Daily Soup
itemPage.description: Everyday vegetable soup.
itemPage.ingredients: Zucchini, carrot, potato, onion
itemPage.preparation: Fry onion, add vegetables, and cook.

itemPage.title: Personal Soup
itemPage.description: A soup made just for you.
itemPage.ingredients: Whatever you like, to taste
itemPage.preparation: Cook with love.
